content: are you obsessed with what your baby puts in her mouth make this easy crochet bunny ears teether for your baby to chew on it s not only cute but the baby can safely chew on the fabric and even reach the hard spots on the back of his mouth please remember to grab a nice cotton yarn preferably with an oeko-tex certification this crochet teether can easily get wet and placed in the freezer for a while helping little babies with the pain of their sore gums tested and approved by both of my kids and lots of nephews and nieces but don t take my word or theirs - for it try it out for yourself
